name: Light GRUN
description:
Light GRUN is a procedurally generated endless runner, crossed with a point 'n shoot lightgun style game.

I haven't seen this mash-up of genres before,  but after buying (and waiting for) the 'Sinden Lightgun' I thought I'd give the concept a go!

This is my first ever game. I've chosen Godot as the game engine.

Run the survival course for as long as you can! Enemies and Spikes will try to kill you, try to remain focused as the game picks up the pace.

High scores are global - top ten seed runs displayed, challenge them, or get a new seed up there!

Tips:

  •  After completing a run, the seed from that run will populate the box on the menu, if you want to run a DIFFERENT course, clear the seed.
  •  Clicking a seed on the high scores will return you to the menu with that seed selected.
  •  Loot drops can be walked over or shot to pick them up
  •  'R' or Right-click to reload
  •  Left-click to shoot
  •  Other buttons can be rebound in options if needed
